comment.author: 33876590@N08
comment._content: Seriously, I would still dress like this given half the chance ;o) I think tall hats are really cool but I don't like the strap on Lace sideburns

comment.author: 37002282@N00
comment._content:
I really want to thank The National Library of Wales for sharing such a wealth of wonderful moments in history. I have enjoyed most of the photos more than once. I keep coming back.

This photo is one example that keeps drawing me back for more than one visit.

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/only1tanuki] Thank you for comment. It's good to know that the photos we've been uploading from our collections are so appreciated and provide such enjoyment. Long may it continue!
